title: [Placements] Goldman Sachs:Internships & FTE
content:
Hello everyone...I will be joining pes soon. So, I wanted to know about the minimum cgpa required to apply/get internships/FTE?

*Thank you for wherever answers this ^_^

comments.body: Lol bro only wants goldman sachs , nothing else

minimum GPA to apply : 6.75.  
Safest GPA to be shortlisted : 8.75.  
Read the FAQ's.
